comment: I took CYBR 7300 online with Dr. Whitman. The class entailed 2-3 projects which were laid out clearly with explicit instructions. The 2 exams covered key terms. You have to study/read/watch lectures to succeed, but everything in the class was fair. Overall, I enjoyed the class and would take Dr. Whitman again.

Class was difficult overall. Group projects were involved and exams tough. Please be aware that Michael aka Mike Whitman has most of his ratings now under a new alias on this website as M. Whitman. For any approvers reading this, professors should be held accountable and should not have multiple aliases. Mike aka M. Whitman are the same person.
